thread.title: Isabella

author: Isabella
title: Isabella
text: I got a giftcard from the company for my birthday which I used on a dress that I later figured out I couldn't fit. I sent it back to exchange it for another item but was a bit confused about getting the money back because it was a gift card. I wrote the customer service for my country but that didn't work out so I contacted them through their Facebook page. I got a reply right away and the problem was solved in one day. Very effective and polite and certainly a place I'd like to buy from again!
